artist: Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Artist: After Joannes Meysens
description: portrait 3/4 view waist up of man with left arm raised and pointing up and inward
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: [JACQUES D\'ARTHOIS/ Nasquit en Bruxelles Jan 1613, ou il tien sa residence, les paÿsages en/ grande et petite frome sont tenuz entre les plus plaisans de Flandres./ Joan. Meyssens pinxit et excud.    Petr.de Jode sculpsit.]; in pencil on sheet: [1-42]; on upper right corner of mount in pencil: [70]
title: Portrait of Jacques D"Arthois
